item.title: Yann LeCun‏：“AI as a service is bad business. AI verticals are good. I totally agree.”RT @爱可可-爱生活:【2017 AI初创五大预测：机器人完蛋、深度学习商品化、AI成VC的“清洁技术”翻版、机器学习即服务(MLaaS)面临二次败局、全栈垂直AI初创实际运作】《Five AI Startup Predictions for 2017 | Bradford Cross》by bradford cross http://t.cn/RiXsisc ​
